website_summaries.verdict: A military-style survival guide from a veteran father written in a manly, informative, and funny tone.
pros: Great for men who are not big book readers
A humorous look at the basic essentials
Really helps first-time fathers prepare for labor and delivery
cons: Will not help you with certain specifics such as colic, nor does it give you a deeper understanding of what the mother is going through

customer_reviews.text: Bought to accompany an "expectant mother" book for friends of ours that announced their first baby is on the way. The recipient appreciated the gesture and that this book gives him something to do while his wife is baking their bun in the oven. No earth-shattering advice in here, but it's a cute novelty gift.
